long_description: 50 Hikes in Massachusetts details year-round hikes and walks from the top of the Berkshires to the tip of Cape Cod. Authors: Brian White and John Brady. Softcover, 276 pages; black-and-white photos and maps. Completely updated fourth edition guides hikers, birders, beachcombers and meanderers of all levels through the state's splendid diversity of terrain. Includes gentle walks for the entire family and rugged outings for experienced hikers. As professors of geology, authors bring a depth and freshness to discussions of the state's natural sciences. Trail-specific information includes narratives, distances, hiking duration, elevations and vertical rise, pertinent maps and trailhead directions. Also provides trailhead location by latitude and longitude and pertinent websites. The Countryman Press; fourth edition, copyright 2006.
short_description: 50 Hikes in Massachusetts details year-round hikes and walks from the top of the Berkshires to the tip of Cape Cod.
